actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance and to otherwise improve the educational assistance programs.

summary.text: Increases the rates of educational assistance payable to veterans. Authorizes an eligible veteran to receive increased monthly educational payments and have his periods of entitlement reduced proportionately. Limits the increase payment to twice the amount the veteran is otherwise entitled to receive.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance and to otherwise improve the educational assistance programs.
